name: licensure
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or process of giving or receiving a licence (= a document giving official permission) to do or have something: Comprehensive medical insurance should be a condition of licensure to operate a motor vehicle. People convicted of sexual misconduct are barred from licensure as massage therapists. Related word
